emission_reduction_actions.action: Using recycled CNC chips with Apple’s strongest aluminum alloy
emission_reduction_actions.details: Using recycled CNC chips with Apple’s strongest aluminum alloy for the first time.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Deploying own server design in data centers
emission_reduction_actions.details: Deploying our own server design, developed with a focus on energy and computing efficiency
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Resulting in over 56.7 million kilowatt-hours per year in energy savings

emission_reduction_actions.action: Developing a specification requiring servers to be powered by high-efficiency power supplies
emission_reduction_actions.details: Developing a specification requiring our servers to be powered by high-efficiency power supplies exceeding even the efficiency requirements for ENERGY STAR certification
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Resulting in over 4 million kilowatt-hours per year in energy savings

emission_reduction_actions.action: Prioritizing reducing natural gas usage and replacing natural gas equipment with electrical equipment
emission_reduction_actions.details: Prioritizing reducing natural gas usage and replacing natural gas equipment with electrical equipment

emission_reduction_actions.action: Using recycled water for cooling systems and toilet flushing in Austin campus
emission_reduction_actions.details: Cooling system will be supplied with recycled water, which will also be used for toilet flushing.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Installed water-cooled air-conditioning system in Austin campus
emission_reduction_actions.details: Replaced air-cooled system with a water-cooled system for increased energy efficiency. The cooling system is supplied with recycled water, which is also used for toilet flushing.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Cools Reno data center with outside air
emission_reduction_actions.details: Takes advantage of the mild climate by cooling its servers with outside air whenever possible.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Implemented efficiency measures in European retail stores
emission_reduction_actions.details: Established a task force to exceed energy mandates, identifying and rolling out additional measures related to LED lighting, temperature, and keeping doors closed.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Developed energy tracking and benchmarking system
emission_reduction_actions.details: Includes data from utility meters that continuously monitor 15-minute electricity and daily natural gas energy consumption to identify performance issues and take corrective action.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Implemented energy efficiency program
emission_reduction_actions.details: Adjustments made to 9.3 million square feet of new and existing buildings, including data centers.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Avoided 69.4 million kilowatt-hours of electricity and 161,000 therms of natural gas per year, reducing total energy use by 4 percent and avoiding an additional 27,500 metric tons of CO2e per year.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Supplier Energy Efficiency Program
emission_reduction_actions.details: Helps suppliers optimize their energy use by identifying optimization opportunities, designing solutions through assessments, and providing education and training opportunities.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Invested in supplier efficiency projects using the Asia Green Fund
emission_reduction_actions.details: Provided energy efficiency expertise and finance capital-intensive energy efficiency projects.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Supplier Energy Efficiency Program participation
emission_reduction_actions.details: More than 100 supplier facilities participated in our energy efficiency program.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Achieved over 1.6 billion kilowatt-hours of electricity savings and about 2,039,000 MMBtu in additional energy savings, which together avoided over 1.3 million metric tons of CO2e, representing a 17 percent increase since 2021.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Requires suppliers to measure and report emissions
emission_reduction_actions.details: Since 2019, as part of Apple’s Supplier Code of Conduct, suppliers are required to regularly identify sources of emissions, measure their scope 1 and scope 2 carbon emissions, and make this information available to Apple.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Supplier Clean Energy Program
emission_reduction_actions.details: Over 250 suppliers have committed to 100 percent renewable electricity for Apple production.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: The 13.7 gigawatts of renewable energy procured by suppliers and online in Apple’s supply chain generated 23.7 million megawatt-hours of clean energy, avoiding 17.4 million metric tons of carbon emissions — a 23 percent increase over 2021.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Invested in nearly 500 megawatts of solar and wind projects in China and Japan
emission_reduction_actions.details: To cover emissions from suppliers that we don’t contract with directly.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Investments in energy storage
emission_reduction_actions.details: Invested in utility-scale storage in California and in research on new energy storage technologies.

emission_reduction_actions.action: California Flats storage project
emission_reduction_actions.details: Grid-scale battery energy storage system capable of storing 240 megawatt-hours of electricity.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Supports the 130-megawatt California Flats solar farm by storing excess energy generated during the day and deploying it when it’s most needed.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Biological methanation research at Aarhus University, Denmark
emission_reduction_actions.details: Explores the production of synthetic methane for storage in the existing gas grid, using bacteria to consume hydrogen produced from excess renewable energy and captured carbon dioxide.

emission_reduction_actions.action: China Clean Energy Fund
emission_reduction_actions.details: Enables Apple and our suppliers to invest in clean energy.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: As of March 2023, the fund has invested in over 650 megawatts of renewable electricity projects, with nearly 100 percent of those investments online.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Invested in the 320-megawatt IP Radian solar project in Brown County, Texas
emission_reduction_actions.details: Developing large-scale solar and wind projects in the U.S. and Europe.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Clean Energy Charging
emission_reduction_actions.details: Optimizes iPhone charging to reduce carbon by charging when the grid is using cleaner energy sources.
emission_reduction_actions.timeline: Available in the United States in fall 2022

emission_reduction_actions.action: Power for Impact program
emission_reduction_actions.details: Funds clean energy projects that are mutually beneficial — local communities and organizations get access to cost-effective energy, and Apple retains the environmental attributes of each project.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Invested in ELYSIS
emission_reduction_actions.details: Joint venture to commercialize patented technology that eliminates direct greenhouse gas emissions from the traditional smelting process of aluminum.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Commercial-purity aluminum used in iPhone SE and 16-inch MacBook Pro is the first to be manufactured without creating any direct carbon emissions during the smelting process.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Partnering with manufacturers to prevent F-GHGs from being released
emission_reduction_actions.details: Switching to alternative input gases, optimizing production processes to use and emit fewer F-GHGs, and by installing gas abatement tools.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Shifting to shipping modes that are less carbon-intensive
emission_reduction_actions.details: Using ocean transport instead of air transport whenever possible.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Shipping an item by ocean instead of on an airplane reduces transportation-related emissions by 95 percent.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Piloted a heavy-duty truck fueled by hydrogen in Europe
emission_reduction_actions.details: Working with suppliers to use alternative fuels and electric vehicles.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Incentivizing the use of electric vehicles
emission_reduction_actions.details: Offering more than 1670 EV charging stations and 3200 ports across U.S.-based campuses.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Launched the Restore Fund
emission_reduction_actions.details: Partnered with Conservation International and Goldman Sachs to launch the Restore Fund.
emission_reduction_actions.impact: Closed over $100 million in projects that forecast to remove over one million metric tons of carbon starting in 2025.

emission_reduction_actions.action: Expanded the Restore Fund
emission_reduction_actions.details: Committed additional funds — up to $200 million — that will be managed by Climate Asset Management.
